attributes.review: When I downloaded this app my pet gorilla got kidnapped by a pack of Trump supporters. The app glitches so mush that all the lights in my house wouldn't turn on for 17 days and I know it was this app because when I deleted it my lights turned back on. Also after I downloaded this app my phone exploded.
attributes.title: So bad!!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app while I was talking about the other dragon story but I got the app and my phone got a virus so I put my phone in the toilet and I didn’t get to work and i didn’t get any more Paper for the pirate game. So don’t download this app if you want to have your phone deleted form your hand!🚫👎
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP!!! GIVES YOUR PHONE A VIRUS!!!!!!

attributes.review:

attributes.review: Putting my political views aside (them being that donald trump is a horrible “human” and is a rapist and a homophobe), this app’s software is HORRIBLE!!! I genuinely don’t know how any of it got past the many layers of approval for something to be official to the campaign. This app is UNUSABLE!!!!! Absolutely horrible and anyone who says otherwise is FAKE NEWS
attributes.title: disappointed

attributes.review: I 100% regret getting this app, it makes my phone look terrible! If anybody saw that this app was on my phone i might as well move to japan or something because my social life is GONE. DONT GET IT SAVE YOURSELF WHILE YOU STILL CAN 🥴 they might as well delete it from the app store to save us :( so disappointed in america
attributes.title: I REGRET GETTING IT

attributes.review: My dear pedo- i mean president, i expected better from you. This app will not stop glitching and it keeps freezing and exiting as soon as i start it up! I would not recommend to anyone and will not be reinstalling this app ever again. (if you delete tik tok i’m coming for you and your family 🧚‍♀️)
attributes.title: SO DISAPPOINTED

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to stay on top of the trump rallies and other extras while supporting our president, but all i got was deceit and HORRIBLENESS!! Not easy to use (I am 45) and an awful waste of time! BECAUSE OF THIS I AM THINKING OF VOTING FOR “Sleepy” Joe. You have me at my last straw. Terrible, Awful, Rapidly Declining the economy, Speeding up Coronavirus testing, and overall DISGUSTING! Will be deleting.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE!! ALMOST AS BAD AS LIBERAL MILENNIALS!

attributes.review: Honestly I’m heartbroken. I really thought the people of America were smarter. But now I realize why Europe kicked them out of their country in the past. It’s a country made of the poorest minded and insanely pathetic. It’s built on the back of slaves and corruption and I’ll gladly stay in this country to watch it fall 😿😹😻😽.
attributes.title: So he’s still a thing???

attributes.review: I cannot even put into words how much I dislike this app. The chances of me downloading this app again is less than 1% if not 0%. It’s like your least favorite food mixed with an expired hot cheeto. I cannot put into words how much I want this app to go away.
attributes.title: Don’t even bother downloading this app.
